code: import{dAppName}from'config';import withPageTitle from'./components/PageTitle';import Home from'./pages/Home';import Race from'./pages/Race';export var routeNames={home:'/',transaction:'/transaction',unlock:'/unlock',ledger:'/ledger',walletconnect:'/walletconnect',race:'/race'};var routes=[{path:routeNames.home,title:'Home',component:Home},{path:routeNames.race,title:'Race',component:Race}];var mappedRoutes=routes.map(function(route){var title=route.title?"".concat(dAppName," \u2022 ").concat(route.title):"Elrond ".concat(dAppName);var requiresAuth=Boolean(route.authenticatedRoute);var wrappedComponent=withPageTitle(title,route.component);return{path:route.path,component:wrappedComponent,authenticatedRoute:requiresAuth};});export default mappedRoutes;
